description: A lighthearted take on finding food in the frosty air.
title: Snowy Snacks
n_1: Flurry and Gust stand in a blizzard, tongues out.
c1_1: Who needs lunch with snowflakes like these?
n_2: Gust catches a big snowflake, eyes wide with delight.
n_3: They compete to catch more, laughing and spinning.
n_4: As night falls, they're full and happy.
c1_4: Who knew winter could be so filling?
